overview.title: TECHNICAL PROFILE
items: 4+ years architecting and delivering full-cycle web applications and platforms from concept through high-availability production deployments.

Deep expertise across modern frontend ecosystems: React, Next.js, Gatsby, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Ant Design, SCSS — consistently deliver performant, maintainable UIs adaptable to evolving project and design requirements.

Architected micro-frontend architectures using Webpack Module Federation — enabled independent team deployments, shared dependencies to reduce bundle size, dynamic module loading at runtime, and seamless composition of remote applications into cohesive experiences.
Craft pixel-perfect, responsive, cross-browser interfaces that faithfully translate complex Figma designs into production-grade code.

Architect scalable backend systems with Node.js and NestJS: design modular, clean-architecture APIs (REST/GraphQL), enforce TypeScript patterns (DI, decorators, guards, interceptors), and ensure long-term maintainability and extensibility.

Designed and implemented event-driven microservices architectures — leveraged RabbitMQ for reliable message queuing, pub/sub patterns, asynchronous processing, and decoupled communication across services in high-throughput systems.
Model and optimize data layers using PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis — implement efficient caching strategies, session management, and query performance tuning for high-traffic scenarios.

Manage Git-based development workflows in collaborative teams, leveraging Jira, Confluence, and Bitbucket for planning, code reviews, branching strategies, and continuous integration; experienced with git submodules for managing shared libraries and monorepo-like structures in distributed codebases.
Develop automation and infrastructure-as-code solutions: author shell scripts, YAML configs for CI/CD pipelines, Docker Compose, GitHub Actions, and routine operational tooling.

Orchestrate headless CMS integrations and customizations (Prismic, Strapi) — architect complete content pipelines, build bespoke plugins, extensions, scripts, and webhook-driven flows tightly aligned with business logic and scalability needs.

Design and implement CRM & scheduling platform integrations (Chilipiper, Intercom, HubSpot) — establish reliable data synchronization, event-driven webhooks, and automated business workflows that support operational efficiency.

Lead secure payment gateway integrations for Southeast Asian providers (Xendit, MoMo, VNPay) — engineer robust checkout experiences, real-time webhook handling, idempotent processing, and compliance-focused transaction logic.

Proactively optimize personal and team productivity through workflow innovation — engineer customized terminal environments (tmux/Zellij) with tailored keybindings, persistent multi-pane layouts, and session management to accelerate development velocity and multitasking.
Author high-quality technical documentation, architecture diagrams, READMEs, and stakeholder presentations that drive alignment, reduce onboarding time, and support long-term maintainability.

items.title: Designveloper - Software Development Company
items.subTitle: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
items.description:
- Collaborated with a New Zealand-based client in the PDF tools domain, optimizing web performance and enhancing user acquisition strategies.
- Developed and maintained high-performance landing pages using Gatsby, Next.js, and React to maximize SEO and user engagement.
- Led the migration from Next.js Page Router to App Router, leveraging Server Components for improved SEO and performance.
- Transitioned the backend from Next.js to NestJS for better scalability and maintainability.
- Integrated and optimized CMS platforms such as Prismic, HubSpot, and Strapi to enable marketing teams to create and launch static pages independently.
- Empowered the client with a no-code approach, allowing rapid deployment of marketing campaigns and landing pages without developer intervention.
- Optimized UX and performance for functional tool pages (e.g., Merge, Split, Compress, Annotate PDF) and static pages, contributing to 100K+ signups within a month.
- Developed high-ranking PDF templates, securing a spot in the top 10 Google search results.
- Contributed to the company's milestone of reaching +100 million users by improving key traffic-driving features, including localization, static tool pages, and universal CMS integration.
- Migrated Google Tag Manager to a server-side setup, reducing client-side JavaScript load and boosting landing page performance by 2-4%.
- "Sharing Spark Award" for outstanding knowledge sharing and workshop organization.
